name: Man Alive
description: Man Alive is a platform game with a twist (or two). We are working with the idea that death is not the end. There are no health packs, because we promote death in Man Alive!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7 / 8 处理器: 2 GHz 内存: 512 MB RAM 图形: 5 years or younger. Integrated graphics and very low budget cards may not work. DirectX 版本: 9.0c 存储空间: 需要 150 MB 可用空间
